suncertify.fields.viewers
Class IntegerFieldView

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.fields.viewers.IntegerFieldView
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, FieldView<IntegerField>
public final class IntegerFieldView
extends java.lang.Object
implements FieldView<IntegerField>

Viewer class to display an IntegerField as a string. Null values are shown as blank strings.

See Also:
Serialized Form
